scripts.build-client-public: touch client/public/js/client-backoffice-stuff.fjs && rm client/public/js/client-backoffice-stuff.fjs && rm -rf client/src/pages/markdowns && cp -R markdowns client/src/pages/ && cd client && npm run build-public
scripts.build-client-bo: cp client-backoffice-javascript/client-backoffice-stuff.fjs client/public/js/ && rm -rf client/src/pages/markdowns && cp -R markdowns client/src/pages/ && cd client && npm run build-backoffice
